issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Tracking JIRA for PARQUET-1857 (unencrypted INT16_MAX Parquet row group limit)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8706](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8706). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
JIRA tracking PARQUET-1857 to make sure this patch gets included in a patch release

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8706?focusedCommentId=17101939) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This was merged
